meta.description: Disallow this/super before calling super() in constructors

content.introduction:
Disallowthis/superbefore callingsuper()in constructors
âœ…RecommendedUsing therecommendedconfig from@eslint/jsin aconfiguration fileenables this rule
Table of ContentsRule DetailsExamplesWhen Not To Use ItHandled by TypeScriptVersionResources
In the constructor of derived classes, ifthis/superare used beforesuper()calls, it raises a reference error.
This rule checksthis/superkeywords in constructors, then reports those that are beforesuper().
